name: strain_type
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weed_strain.
Tool description: Basic information on all weed strain. Build mobile apps for weed strains.
API description: Fetches a list of results based on the specified strain type from the Weed Strain API.

straintype.description: The type of strain to search for (e.g., Indica, Sativa, Hybrid).
